attributes.review:
I downloaded this app thinking it would give me insight into the campaign but it was filled with Neo-Nazis, racists, and illiterate-trash that don’t know the difference between to, too, and two.
This app was clearly developed from remnants of Donald’s toilet. Which is sad because those are his best attributes.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever
GET TRUMP OUT OF OFFICE, also, don’t download this app other than to give it one star❤️

attributes.review: I was opening this app and trying to enjoy it when a old lady crawled out of my tv and started yelling the words to gooba by 6in9ine and i got really scared. I asked her who she was and then she disappeared. I closed the app to try and find her again when a dog ran in my door standing on its hind legs ( he lowkey was kinda hot tho... 👁👄👁) and put me in a headlock and yelled have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄  I was so scared i quickly grabbed  My grabbed my megaphone and asked who sent them. They all said the trump app and they were forcing me to vote for trump! Then Willy Wonka came over and asked if i had plan B for one of his ompa Loompas. I gave it to him willingly. My oranges are now wearing suits and saying LETS BUILD A WALL! When I finally got everybody got out of my house i could finally settle down and reopen the app, then a whole swat team came to my house and crashed open my windows saying we did it!! As the manny flag was hanging off of their helicopter there I saw him Barron trump. We then went away on the helicopter only for the dog to come back and push me out of the helicopter. I didn’t have a parachute so I’m now laying on the ground paralyzed writing this review. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS NOT WORTH IT!! overall the experience was horrible.
attributes.title: WORST EXPIERENCE EVER

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app bc I just absolutely love trump but i waited A WEEK for it to download, a week. I just gave up
attributes.title: 🧚✨ i m p o r t a n t 🧚✨
